ComicInfo.Title: The Duck Knight Returns
ComicInfo.Summary:
You demanded it. And BOOM! Studios delivers. Don’t miss the long-awaited, much requested return of your favorite, Darkwing Duck. Once St. Canard’s greatest protector, Darkwing Duck was known the world over as ‘The Terror That Flaps In The Night.’ Now, mysteriously, DW has not been seen or heard from in well over a year – and St. Canard finds that evil is once again on the rise. But when a nefarious plan threatens everyone, Darkwing Duck knows it’s time for the Duck Knight to return! ‘Let’s Get Dangerous!’ with Disney and BOOM! Studios as one of Disney’s most beloved characters makes a comeback in his own not-to-be-missed original ongoing series!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover A | Magic Eye Studios | 1 | B | Regular Cover B | James Silvani & Andrew Dalhouse | 4 | RE | New York Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover | | 2 | RI | 1:10 The Dark Knight Returns Retailer Incentive Cover | Jake Myler & James Silvani | 3 | RE | San Diego Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover | James Silvani | 6 | 2nd | Second Printing Cover | James Silvani | 5 | *Notes:* The San Diego Comic Con Exclusive cover is a homage and a parody of the cover of Batman: The Dark Knight #1.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-25 20:43:31. [CVDB219506]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Andrew Dalhouse, Jake Myler, James Silvani, Magic Eye Studios
ComicInfo.Characters: Bushroot, Darkwing Duck, Gosalyn Waddlemeyer, Honker Muddlefoot, Launchpad McQuack, Megavolt, Quackerjack, The Liquidator
ComicInfo.Teams: Quackwerks, St. Canard Police Department, The Fearsome Five
ComicInfo.Locations: Audubon Bay Bridge, Duckburg, St. Canard, St. Canard Tower, Starducks, The Mallard Residence
